dict.acceptation: 受痛苦；受损害；变糟；变差；

sent.orig: If we must suffer,let us suffer nobly.
sent.trans: 如果我们必须受苦，那就让我们爽快的忍受吧。

sent.orig: If you think you suffer in life, do you suffer as much as he does?
sent.trans: 如果你得你生活在痛苦之中，你的痛苦像他的一样多、一样重吗？

sent.orig: Why, for example, must millions of innocents suffer the ravages of disease and other natural disasters?
sent.trans: 例如，成千上万的无辜者为什么必须遭受疾病的折磨和自然灾害的蹂躏？

sent.orig: Install firewall program for computer, prevent individual account information to suffer hacker filch.
sent.trans: 为电脑安装防火墙程序，防止个人账户信息遭到黑客窃取。

sent.orig: Soft straps so that they at least will not suffer by the pole.
sent.trans: 软软的背带起码不会让他们受扁担之苦。
